DOC.brief_summary: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine response rate 1-year event-free survival patient refractory pemphigus treat high-dose cyclophosphamide .
DOC.brief_title: Phase II Study High-Dose Cyclophosphamide Patients With Refractory Pemphigus
DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : Patients receive cyclophosphamide IV day 1-4 filgrastim ( G-CSF ) begin day 10 continue blood count recover . Patients follow monthly 6 month , every 2 month 6 month , every 4 month year , annually thereafter .
